item.description:
Our February meetup will be held a little later in the month due to Canine Good Citizen Testing going on at the center. I apologize if this inconveniences anyone. We will play in our indoor room again since it is so cold outside! I think the dogs would like it, but I can't say the same for the owners!! Anyone and everyone with a friendly dog is welcome to attend. Hope to see you then.

Let me know if you have any questions!

Held at Best Friends Pet Care off of Rt-97 less than a mile from I-95.

Thanks, Mirya

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs February Meetup
